sentences: Jadon Laird Lavik (born May 23, 1978) is an American contemporary Christian music singer-songwriter, formerly signed with BEC Recordings.
Born in Redmond, Washington, Lavik's parents are Philip and Christine.
He has an older brother, Justin, and a younger sister, Anna.
Lavik was on the If I Had One Chance to Tell You Something Tour with Rebecca St. James and BarlowGirl in early 2006 to promote his album, Life on the Inside.
Lavik is married and lives in San Clemente, California.
